title: IPL 2022: Disney Star deploys tech innovations including Dolby Atmos support, metaverse show - The Indian Express
content: IPL 2022: Disney Star deploys tech innovations including Dolby Atmos support, metaverse show  The Indian Express
description: Cricket viewers in the country will now be able to watch the IPL in Dolby Atmos on Star Sports1 HD and Star Sports1 Hindi HD.
